articles.title: Google to Spend $9 Billion in Oklahoma to Expand AI, Cloud Infrastructure
articles.summary: Alphabet's Google said it will spend an additional $9 billion in Oklahoma over the next two years to expand cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure.
articles.translated_title: Google to Spend $9 Billion in Oklahoma to Expand AI, Cloud Infrastructure
articles.translated_summary: Alphabet's Google said it will spend an additional $9 billion in Oklahoma over the next two years to expand cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure.

articles.title: Apple's AI Comeback Plans Include Robots, Lifelike Siri
articles.summary: Apple Inc. is plotting its artificial intelligence comeback with an ambitious slate of new devices, including robots, a lifelike version of Siri, a smart speaker with a display and home-security cameras. Bloomberg‚Äôs Mark Gurman speaks with Romaine Bostick and Matt Miller on ‚ÄúThe Close‚Äù about Apple‚Äôs next inventions. (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: AI 'godfather' Geoffrey Hinton warns machines may outthink humans in years
articles.summary: Geoff Hinton warns artificial intelligence could surpass humans within years, not decades, and recommends a focus on creating maternal instincts in machines.
articles.translated_title: AI 'godfather' Geoffrey Hinton warns machines may outthink humans in years
articles.translated_summary: Geoff Hinton warns artificial intelligence could surpass humans within years, not decades, and recommends a focus on creating maternal instincts in machines.

articles.title: Trump‚Äôs AI chip deal sparks legal questions and national security concerns
articles.summary: President Trump stunned many in the tech world after announcing a controversial deal with chipmakers Nvidia and AMD, allowing them to sell advanced artificial intelligence chips to China in exchange for giving the U.S. government a 15% cut of their revenue. Amna Nawaz discussed the legality of this deal and its implications with Scott Kennedy of the Center for Strategic and International Studies.

articles.title: Illinois law bans AI use to provide mental health advice
articles.summary: Illinois recently passed a law that prohibits the use of artificial intelligence for mental health interactions or decisions.

articles.title: AI demand expected to boost electronics giant Foxconn's second-quarter profit
articles.summary: Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker, is expected to report on Thursday that second-quarter profit rose 14% on continued strong demand for artificial intelligence servers.
articles.translated_title: AI demand expected to boost electronics giant Foxconn's second-quarter profit
articles.translated_summary: Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker, is expected to report on Thursday that second-quarter profit rose 14% on continued strong demand for artificial intelligence servers.

articles.title: Elon Musk's xAI loses co-founder Igor Babuschkin for venture firm
articles.summary: Igor Babuschkin, who helped start xAI in 2023, said in a post on X that he's leaving the artificial intelligence startup to launch his own venture firm.
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk's xAI loses co-founder Igor Babuschkin for venture firm
articles.translated_summary: Igor Babuschkin, who helped start xAI in 2023, said in a post on X that he's leaving the artificial intelligence startup to launch his own venture firm.

articles.title: XAI co-founder Babuschkin departs to launch AI safety investment firm
articles.summary: Igor Babuschkin, a co-founder of Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI, said on Wednesday that he has left the company and plans to launch an investment firm focused on AI safety research.
articles.translated_title: XAI co-founder Babuschkin departs to launch AI safety investment firm
articles.translated_summary: Igor Babuschkin, a co-founder of Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI, said on Wednesday that he has left the company and plans to launch an investment firm focused on AI safety research.

articles.title: YouTube to begin testing a new AI-powered age verification system in the US
articles.summary: YouTube on Wednesday will begin testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors, based on the kinds of videos that they have been watching.
articles.translated_title: YouTube to begin testing a new AI-powered age verification system in the US
